message.content:
cs.NI, cs.DS, cs.DC, cs.IT, cs.SY 

This paper deals with the problem of optimizing data broadcast in wireless communication environments, which is a topic that falls under the category of networked and distributed systems (cs.NI). The paper also involves the design and analysis of algorithms, which is a common theme in the category of data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of correlations between user requests to improve the efficiency of the broadcast system, which is related to the field of information theory (cs.IT). The paper also presents a fair allocation of resources to users, which is a topic in the category of systems and control (cs.SY). Finally, the paper involves the scheduling of jobs with dependencies, which is a problem that falls under the category of distributed computing (cs.DC).
